  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.atakmap.android.drawing.details.GenericDetailsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, MapItem.OnMetadataChangedListener, ToolListener

    public abstract class GenericDetailsView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
implements android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, ToolListener, MapItem.OnMetadataChangedListener
